body.name: Miraculous Ladybug Magic Heroez Transformation Surprise
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 26 mins
features: HIDDEN HEROEZ: Discover Miraculous new superheroes with Marinette! Each Magic Heroez Transformation doll has a special super-suit design; add water to reveal a fox, rabbit, or ladybug hero!

ADD WATER TO TRANSFORM: Reveal Marinette's super-secret superhero identity with water and some Miraculous magic! Add water, place Marinette and the magical pink packet in the Miraculous tube, swirl, and watch her magical reveal happen!
COMPLETE HER SUPERHERO LOOK: Each Magic Heroez Transformation doll includes three different accessories—Kwamis, removable masks, and more!

MAKE A SPLASH: Marinette looks Miraculous with her signature blue hair styled in her iconic ponytails, and her signature earrings. Collect all the Magic Heroez Transformation dolls for more Miraculous possibilities!
IT'S OFFICIAL: This product is officially licensed from ZAG, creator of Miraculous.
body.description: Time to transform! Now that Marinette is the Guardian of the Miraculous, she can transform into any hero! Will she transform into the Rabbit, Fox, or Ladybug? Add water to reveal Marinette's decision! The set includes 10.5” Marinette doll, a pink magical dissolving packet that reveals her hero accessories and a Miraculous tube to contain the water and the doll for her mysterious transformation. Which one will she transform into?
